messages.messageBody:
Hi,
Can you resend the original post?? I seem to have missed it and I've been unsuccessful in digging it up. Also, I would recommend calling your congressional reps.

Peace,
Janis
'The hottest places in hell are reserved for those who, in times of great moral crises, maintain their neutrality.' Dante

messages.subject: December 1st Call In Day
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Homeschoolers, I would like to request that all homeschool groups and individuals in this country that are not represented by HSLDA call the White House
messages.messageBody:
Dear Homeschoolers,

I would like to request that all homeschool groups and individuals
in this country that are not represented by HSLDA call the White
House on December 1 to let them know that :

A) All homeschoolers in this country are not represented by HSLDA
and Mike Farris
B) If you oppose HR2732/SB1562 please tell the White House/President
Bush
C) Remind them that federal legislation of education is
unconstitutional

Thanks.


Mailing Address

The White House
1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW
Washington, DC 20500


Phone Numbers

Comments: 202-456-1111
Switchboard: 202-456-1414
FAX: 202-456-2461

TTY/TDD

Comments: 202-456-6213
Visitors Office: 202-456-2121
E-Mail
President George W. Bush: president@...
Vice President Richard Cheney: vice.president@...
